(Original) Simply amazing! One of my favorite roller coasters of all time. The first drop and dive under the bridge are just incredible!!! Definitely recommend getting at least one ride in the front for the 95 mph wind experience!!!

topComments.author: Andrew Komyati Historical Headlines
topComments.comment: Fury 325 has also been voted the world's best steel coaster in Amusement Today's Golden Ticket Awards.  Tallest roller coaster that uses a traditional chain lift hill.  6,602 ft long.

topComments.author: Mike DaRollerCoasterGuy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Essa montanha-russa me surpreendeu! Coloquei-o no meu top 3 cr√©ditos ap√≥s o primeiro passeio. Opera√ß√µes incr√≠veis e funcion√°rios simp√°ticos! Eu sugiro comprar o fast lane pass. A fila estava em m√©dia de 45 minutos a uma hora quando fui. Com a pista r√°pida o mais longo que esperei foi de 4 minutos. Bem feito Carowinds!!  (Original) This coaster blew my away! I placed it in my top 3 credits after the first ride. Amazing operations and friendly staff! I highly suggest buying the fast lane pass. The line was averaging about 45 minutes to an hour when I went. With the fast lane the longest I waited was 4 minutes. Well done Carowinds!!

(Original) Came all the way from upstate New York to ride it during Spring Break. This coaster has been on my bucket list since it was built, it did not dissapoint. Certain park policies did (in particular reguarding how they closed the park) but I can't hold that against this awesome coaster.

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Melhor montanha russa que eu j√° estive. Grande mistura de altura e velocidade.  (Original) Best Rollercoaster I have ever been on. Great mix of height and speed.

topComments.author: Max Well
topComments.comment: This amazing fast thrilling roller coaster is inside of Carowinds theme park. The cost of admission to Carowinds is $55 per person, plus tax and service fees, on weekends plus $25 parking fee. The fast pass is $109 plus tax and service fees... I don't know if it's worth it or not,  the lines are two hours long sometimes.
